Name: Broodbar
Review Text: 10/10 would recommend for a quick lunch or coffee. Delicious food, personal service. The pastrami sandwich was otherworldly!

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Good food for a quick lunch break, and friendly staff. Not too expensive either. They also have a cute dog ! Try the carrot cake !

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Delicious sandwiches.. Really good coffee. Pretty nice staffs /or owner. You can choice what do you prefer to eat with sandwich, with what kind of bread which is made by many different type of flour varieties. Places don't have enough space to seat but really charm...

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Really nice affordable prices, nice sandwiches, good coffee, friendly staff. Would recommend this place.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Simply the best breakfast in Amsterdam. We Reality loved the service!

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Lovely shop run by a hard-working lady.  Great coffee, cake, croissants, quiche...  But mostly I like to pop into this place for the cosy feel and location, and being surrounded by delicious things that I'm not all going to eat. ‚Ä¶

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: A super cozy and cute lunchroom! I ordered an orange juice and banana bread. It was delicious. The location is great too, the window bar and terrace look out to the canal. Also heads off for the owner of this place. It was quite busy when I ‚Ä¶

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: We ordered an iced coffee with oatmilk. I expected a coffee with ice as that is what an iced coffee is. However, before they started to blend it, I politely asked if they could not. The woman said to me "well, that is how we make it here ‚Ä¶

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: I had the best cheesecake ever here. I think it's very local place where you can have breakfast or coffee with a piece of cake. It is small but cosy. Great location by the canal and seats outside make you want to stop there and enjoy the moment.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Was ways higher than my expectations! Very tasty soup and sandwich, good view, good price. Definitely best food experience I had in Amsterdam!

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Family business, really tasty homemade sandwiches.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Great place! Super tasty hot sandwitches and coffee. One of the few places that open early in the morning. Great view on the channel from the window seats. Pleasant staff.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Sweet little sandwich shop with good service. Can get a little slow when crowded as there is only one lady working the kitchen and serving.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Just ordered a combined menu with quiche and tosti for 14 euro's. What a disappointment. Quiche was extremely small and full of onions. Tosti was very soft, not tasty at all and when I found a hair in it i throwed it away immediately.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: This place was fab. Freshly made pancakes, bacon and eggs. Quiet little cafe. Perfect.

Name: Broodbar
Review Text: Lovely place; pretty good coffee Italian style; warm atmosphere a good place to work in creative mode; typical Amsterdam style with nice view and quite relaxed environment ; suggest to go

Name: Broodbar
